game.name: Night Watchmen Stories Zombie Hospital
game.description: You are working as Night Watchman in the Hospital. You Fall Asleep... Strange Sound Wake You Up! Soon you realise that reality and nightmare are the same... Features: - Good Horror story, like in Classic Horror Movies. - Six Weapons: Bottle, Colt 45, Grenade, Bazooka, Minigun and Shotgun! - Smooth Controls. - High quality 3D environment graphics. - Awesome Gameplay.
game.metaTitle: Night Watchmen Stories Zombie Hospital, Zombie Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com

game.webControlKeys: WA,S,D ALL ARROWS TO MOVE,MOUSE - MLOOK AROUND,L CLICK- FIRE, RIGHT CLICK- AIM,MOUSE WHEEL- CHANGE THE WEAPON, G- GRANED, R- RELOAD, F- PICK UP THE ITEMS,L SHIFT- RUN, L CTRL- CROUCH, C- PRONE, SPACE- JUMP
